description: This file defines the PlayerScreen widget for a Flutter music streaming app, showing song info, controls, and playback progress within a UI screen.

classes.name: PlayerScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the full-screen music player UI, including album art, song info, and controls.

classes.name: _AlbumArtPlaceholder
classes.description: A stateless widget displaying a placeholder for album art.

classes.name: _SongInfo
classes.description: A widget showing the current song's title and artist.

classes.name: _PositionSlider
classes.description: A widget with a slider to show and seek the current position in the song.

classes.name: _ControlsRow
classes.description: A widget with playback control buttons such as previous, next, and toggle play/pause.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the PlayerScreen, displaying song info and controls.

methods.name: _format
methods.description: Formats a Duration into a mm:ss string for display.
